snippet: A court grievance panel blocked Ivan S. Fisher from practicing in the Southern District of New York, saying he stole from a client.
abstract: Prominent criminal defense lawyer Ivan S Fisher is barred from practicing law in Federal District Court in Manhattan, after court grievance is issued saying he stole from a client.
lead_paragraph: A court grievance panel blocked Ivan S. Fisher from practicing in the Southern District of New York, saying he stole from a client.

headline.seo: Ivan Fisher Barred From Practicing Law in U.S. Court in Manhattan
headline.main: Criminal Lawyer Is Barred From Working in U.S. Court
headline.print_headline: Criminal Lawyer Is Barred From Working in U.S. Court
